description: GPA 3.53 of 4.0;This program shares some similarities with vocational high school (SMK) curricula, but offers more in-depth study, particularly in the field of low-current electrical systems. It covers topics such as PLC operation, programming, maintenance and repair of electronic systems, and PCB design.

This program equips students with a solid foundation in audio-video concepts, low-current electrical systems, maintenance and servicing procedures for audio-video systems, as well as the development and assembly of electronic devices.
